import React from 'react'; class Register extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = { name : "", email : "", password : "", password2 : "", errros : {} } } onChange(e){ this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } render(){ return( <>

This site uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email
) } } export default Register;
